SELECT (case when DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' THEN '设备' WHEN DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产' THEN '生产' WHEN DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' THEN '电仪' END )section, count(COMPLETESTATE = 'Y' OR NULL) AS checked, count(COMPLETESTATE = 'W' OR NULL) AS unchecked, count(ALTPID = 1 OR NULL) AS alarm, count(ALTPID = 2 OR NULL) AS danger FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (
ZONE_NAME = '再磨机' OR ZONE_NAME = '再磨机稀油润滑系统' OR devName='MQY2745再磨机' OR devName='MQY2745高低压稀油润滑系统' OR devName = 'MQY2745再磨机电机' OR devName='MQY2745再磨机高低压稀油站电机' ) AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据
GROUP BY section
